name: Gaming Community

channels.topic: ğŸ“œ Server rules â€” Read before participating!

embed.title: ğŸ“œ Server Rules
embed.description: Welcome! Please read and follow these rules to keep our community great.

fields.name: 1ï¸âƒ£ Be Respectful
fields.value: Treat everyone with respect. No harassment, hate speech, or personal attacks.

fields.name: 2ï¸âƒ£ No Spam
fields.value: No spam, self-promotion, or excessive caps. Use the right channels for your content.

fields.name: 3ï¸âƒ£ No NSFW
fields.value: Keep all content SFW. This includes profile pictures, usernames, and status.

fields.name: 4ï¸âƒ£ English in General
fields.value: Use English in general channels. Other languages welcome in designated channels.

fields.name: 5ï¸âƒ£ No Cheating/Exploits
fields.value: Discussion of cheats, hacks, or exploits is strictly prohibited.

fields.name: 6ï¸âƒ£ Listen to Staff
fields.value: Follow staff instructions. If you disagree, DM a moderator privately.

fields.name: 7ï¸âƒ£ No Drama
fields.value: Keep personal conflicts out of public channels. Use DMs or contact staff.

fields.name: 8ï¸âƒ£ Have Fun!
fields.value: This is a gaming community â€” enjoy yourself and make friends! ğŸ®

embed.footer: Breaking rules may result in mute, kick, or ban.
